Try.description: By default IDEA completes your code instantly. Start typing Ran right where a cursor is, and you will see Lookup Menu of completions. You can choose first item from Lookup menu by pressing
To activate Basic Completion action type <action="CodeCompletion"> and you will see lookup menu again
Press <action="EditorEnter"> to choose top item from lookup menu
Sometimes you need to find completions for static constants or methods. Press <action="CodeCompletion"> twice to increase search level of Code Completion
